_sText:
BETA VERSION   //Read this

-fixed 5th level crash bug.
-added 2 new levels.
-some models dont get packed somehow, dunno why. even if i pack all files manually it doesnt add them correctly. ill try fix this on later version but now i just have to add those files with .bsp. place folders to ur cstrike folder.
-added light sources. im not sure anout these yet. maybe ill change it be completely only light from "cracks" at roof like in base (levels 1-4)
-map logo is still pretty poor. (that one at screen) ill try make better one as soon i get some ideas.
-added screenoverlay. simple bhop research laboratories logo at left-down corner. (no its not any added afterwards to screenshots. screenshots are non-edited in-game screenshots.)
-remade some models to make lightning look better. tho teleport to 1st level still seems bug on others than me. ill still continue tryes to fix it, but dunno is it possible.
-darkness of some levels is part of gameplay.
-glass break with nades level 5. (cause inbuild antiflash no flash/smoke/blow)
-climb at 6th. (maybe will be changed to bhop in later versions to make it harder)
-more details to spawn and more night feel.

-map still have no hdr or soundscapes. started make hdr but didnt get it like i want it to be yet. dunno is it even needed so might be that i dont make it. also i have some ideas for sounds / soundscapes but i rly dont want rush with them.

Thats all came to mind now. Please report any bugs u might found.

Have fun.



______________________________________________________________________________

Searching:
-sound artist (some wordless songs as background musics/soundscapes)
-texture artist (several different theme packs)
-voice actor (some stuff via voice changer so it sounds like synthetic / computer like.)
-video editor (map teaser videos)
-model artist (some advanced modeling)
-Have some special skills that arent listed here? tell me.

contact me if u wanna help^^






______________________________________________________________________________

(asked for developer team and they said yes. that i was allowed use kzmod content doesnt make u allowed to. if u want use them, ask first)

Rest of models and textures are made by me.

if I forgot something, please tell.

______________________________________________________________________________


If u have any ideas to improve map, please tell me^^


subscribe if you like ;)



Tip: if u want test map in lan but dont know how change tick after updates of css, read about it from here;
http://www.fpsbanana.com/tuts/10257
